TopicTitle: KAS issues with Karbonite and USI explorer pack

Articles.Content:
I don't know where is start with this problem. I'm hoping someone can point me in the right direction.

I haven't been able to open the edit container window in the SPH/VAB. I can open the edit container window in flight mode thou. I have deleted everything in the KSP folder and reacquired KSP through Steam. All mods were installed via CKAN except Firespitter.dll, Rasterpropmonitor.dll, and MJ2. The FS and RPM.dlls were downloaded from the author's pages. MJ2 is the most recent dev version. The rest are whatever is current on CKAN.

Base installed mods: ATM, KAS, Firespitter dll, RPM dll, KSP-AVC, MJ2, Module Manager, Toolbar, USI tools, CRP, Regolith.

With the above mods installed, the KAS edit container window works in the SPH/VAB screens.

After I install Karbonite or the explorer pack, the KAS edit container window doesn't open and this error ends up in the debug log in the game: ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Argument is out of range.

Here is the full error from the output log: 

C:/BuildAgent/work/d63dfc6385190b60/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 49)

ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Argument is out of range.

Parameter name: index

 at System.Collections.Generic.List`1[system.Single].get\_Item (Int32 index) [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

 at Firespitter.customization.FSfuelSwitch.updateCost () [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

 at Firespitter.customization.FSfuelSwitch.GetModuleCost (Single modifier) [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

 at Part.GetModuleCosts (Single defaultCost) [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

 at KAS.KASModuleContainer+PartContent..ctor (.AvailablePart avPart, KAS.KASModuleGrab grab) [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

 at KAS.KASModuleContainer+PartContent.Get (System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2 table, System.String name, Boolean create) [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

 at KAS.KASModuleContainer.GetAvailableContents () [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

 at KAS.KASModuleContainer.EditContents () [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

 at BaseEvent.Invoke () [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

 at UIPartActionButton.OnClick () [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

(Filename: Line: -1)

The above will repeat every time I click on the edit container button.

The full log is here: [https://onedrive.live.com/embed?cid=F4FEDAE39E942E74&resid=F4FEDAE39E942E74%214745&authkey=AAzCw1iIko79OsA](https://onedrive.live.com/embed?cid=F4FEDAE39E942E74&resid=F4FEDAE39E942E74%214745&authkey=AAzCw1iIko79OsA)
have you tried the firespitter.dll that comes with roverdude's mods ?
I have the same issue, but the fire spitter in Karbonite mods seems to be not compatible with 0.90
